title: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen Deluxe Edition
description: Delve into Savathûn’s twisted Throne World to uncover the mystery of how she and her Lucent Hive stole the Light. From the foundation of the glistening palace to the gnarled roots in the swamp, all that Savathûn hides can be found here. Craft custom weaponry in countless configurations, wield the new Glaive weapon type, and pierce the heart of the Witch Queen’s deceit. The Deluxe Edition includes Seasons 16-19, two Year-5 Dungeons, an Exotic SMG, catalyst, ornament, and an Exotic Sparrow.
notes: Users responsible for fees for broadband internet, which is required.
